item.description: Come join fellow runners and their friends for a fundraising party at the Lansdowne Pub on Saturday, January 21 from 3-6 pm to benefit the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. The Lansdowne is donating a room and appetizers and there will be a bunch of great prizes raffled off! A $5 donation is suggested. Hope to see you there!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Team in Training Madrid Marathon Fundraising Party
